Text:
Right now they don´t have an English page. However the band is considering the creation of one right now.

Thanks for your support. Please check their Orkut community for any news, the community page will be written in English very soon.
Suverän sångerska.Nya Nightwish kanske skulle höra av sig till henne istället för katastrofen dom har nu som sångerska!!!!!!!
